effects.description: A collection of all effects in the game, defining their behaviors, parameters, and conditions.

anim_to_play.description: Animation to play when this effect is triggered.

cancel_subsequent_effects_on_failure.description: Whether to cancel all subsequent effects if this effect fails.

copy_modifiers.description: Whether to copy modifiers when applying this effect.

fail_to_cast_on_failure.description: Whether to fail the entire cast if this effect fails.

filter_on_main_subclass.description: Whether to filter based on the main subclass.

ignore_temporary_modifiers.description: Whether to ignore temporary modifiers when applying this effect.

mod_reference.description: Mod GUID to search for a custom effect. If not specified then your Mod's assembly is searched.

name.description: The EffectStateName, this should be the name of a Class inheriting from CardEffectBase. Trainworks will search your mod for the class, then the base game.

param_bool_2.description: Second boolean parameter for the effect.

param_card_pool.description: Reference to CardPool for the effect.

param_character_data.description: Reference to character data for the effect.

param_int_2.description: Second integer parameter for the effect.

param_int_3.description: Third integer parameter for the effect.

param_max_int.description: Maximum integer value for the effect.

param_min_int.description: Minimum integer value for the effect.

param_multipler.description: Multiplier parameter for the effect. Defaults to 1.0

param_status_effects.description: List of status effects to apply.

param_subtypes.description: Subtype parameter for the effect. Defaults to SubtypesData_None.

param_upgrade.description: Reference to an upgrade to apply.

should_test.description: Whether this effect should be tested before applying.

show_pyre_notification.description: Whether to show a notification in the Pyre UI.

skip_subsequent_previews.description: Whether to skip previewing subsequent effects.

status_effect_filters.description: List of status effects to filter by.

supress_pyre_room_focus.description: Whether to suppress Pyre room focus when applying this effect.

target_ignore_bosses.description: Whether to ignore boss characters when targeting.

target_mode_health_filter.description: Filter for target health when selecting targets.

target_selection_mode.description: Mode for selecting cards as targets.

target_subtype.description: Subtype to target. Defaults to SubtypesData_None

use_health_missing_multipler.description: Whether to use missing health as a multiplier.

use_int_range.description: Whether to use an integer range for parameters.

use_magic_power_multipler.description: Whether to use magic power as a multiplier.

use_status_effect_multiplier.description: Whether to use status effect count as a multiplier.

items.description: An effect definition that specifies how a card or ability affects the game state.
